channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Sloth Logo Customizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Sloth Logo Customizer

item.title: CVE-2023-0603|2023-05-08T13:58:23.850Z -- unknown -- sloth%20logo%20customizer
item.description: The Sloth Logo Customizer WordPress plugin through 2.0.2 does not have CSRF check when updating its settings, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack
